goal.ch: 課程內容涵蓋氣候變遷基本概念、氣候變遷衝擊評估流程與方法、調適規劃等，以氣候變遷影響之水文、水資源、糧食生產、公共衛生與自然災害等社會民生關注議題為主，並說明跨領域議題之衝擊與調適所面臨之挑戰與國際上調適科技發展趨勢。課程目標在傳授氣候變遷衝擊評估之基本觀念與技巧，調適策略擬定方法與未來發展方向，期望使不同專業領域學生具備氣候變遷調適科技建構能力。
goal.en: This course will cover basic concepts, impact assessment, and adaptation planning for climate change. Selected special topics, such as water, food security, human health, and natural disasters, will be arranged by invited talks. Challenges in transdisciplinary research and trends in adaptation technologies development against the impacts of climate change will be discussed. This course aims to provide knowledge and tools for climate change impact assessment and understanding of framework and procedures in adaptation planning. Through lectures and invited talks, students from different disciplines are expected to have capacities for climate change impact and adaptation.

outline.ch:
緒論
氣候變遷基礎觀念
氣候變遷情境與模擬
降尺度與氣象資料繁衍
水文循環與水文模擬
氣候變遷衝擊評估
氣候變遷調適規劃
氣候變遷專題系列(水、災害、糧食、公衛、能源)
outline.en:
Introduction
Basic concept of climate change
Scenario and simulation of climate change
Downscaling and weather generation
Hydrological cycles and simulations
Climate change impact assessment
Climate adaptation planning
Special topics in climate change (e.g., water, disaster, food security, human health, energy)
